job.title: Senior Software Engineer Android
job.description: ltstronggtltugtposition summary what youll doltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwhat youll doltbrgtltbrgtas a senior software engineer youll spend your days translating requirements into solutions writing code collaborating with crossfunctional teams and providing us with the insights necessary to think beyond the status quo youll oversee small project teams consisting of other engineers who will look to you as a trusted advisor a subject matter expert who provides guidance and the right tools to get the job done you will have an opportunity to design and develop new innovative and security features for walmart account ampamp identity platform you will be responsible build the android app modules components you will also work closely with product owners uiux and other senior engineering team members to define the future architecture and system design to support new business needsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtabout youltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtyou have and can implement big ideas with a positive attitude you want to be a part of the team to disrupt this industry and you have these main skillsltbrgtltulgtltligtdemonstrate a strong understanding of the android framework and respective component lifecycles ltligtltligtdemonstrate a strong working knowledge of multithreading networking offline storage and performance tuningltligtltligtunderstand product requirements develop and deploy the software applicationltligtltligtimplement performant code using kotlin and javaltligtltligtexperience using the stateoftheart android libraries android x retrofit etcltligtltligtexperience in good app architecture using design patterns such as mvvm mvp or cleanltligtltligtexperience working with external data sources and apisltligtltligta disciplined approach to development code review testing documentation and code structure in a team environmentltligtltligtdevelop components and modules that add to the pool of reusable and platform capabilities for other application teams to leverageltligtltligtwrite unit test cases to achieve at least code coverage for effective early errors detectionltligtltligtadd application logging monitoring and alerting capabilities to help with operational needs of the application production environment ltligtltligtanalyze and troubleshoot production issues including careful log data analysis and turn around fixes quickly to minimize user impactltligtltligtparticipate in the team codereviewing process to receive and provide constructive feedback to raise the bar of code before being deployedltligtltligta constant desire to improve learn more and take things to the next levelltbrgtltligtltulgtyoull really wow us ifltbrgtltbrgtyour ability to rise above group think and see beyond the here and now is matched only by your intellectual curiosityltbrgtltulgtltligtyou come to the table with a comprehensive knowledge of android kotlin java as well as agile methodologiesltligtltligtyou consider yourself to be a student of the world who thrives in an everchanging environment that holds within it new challenges and chances to prove your expertiseltligtltligtyou level up when you have the opportunity to teach others and empower those around you to excelltligtltligtyou strongly believe in automation including code testing code not just unit but automated testingltligtltligtyou are a practitioner of secure coding patterns and advocate the same across your peersltbrgtltligtltulgtyoull make an impact byltbrgtltulgtltligteffectively translating requirements into project parameters while working with agility from cradle to graveltligtltligthelping crossfunctional teams to solve for business problems and develop solutions that enable us to redefine a bestinclass customer experienceltligtltligtencouraging the project teams that you oversee to work collaboratively and to aim for insightdriven outcomes ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtskill set additionsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtthorough understanding and coding experience using android sdk and jetpack componentsltligtltligtindepth knowledge of android activities fragments navigation lifecycles view models multi layout design styles ampamp themes custom views data binding webviews app bundles accessibility multithreading build flavors gradleltligtltligtexpertise in kotlin and javaltligtltligtexperience in developing via android studio editorltligtltligtexperience in integrating restful and graphql apis using retrofitltligtltligtknowledge of mvvm and clean architectureltligtltligtability to design reusable componentsltligtltligtknowledge of optimizations with limited battery life ampamp storageltligtltligtunitintegrationui testing using junit expresso robolectric mockkltligtltligtstrong debugging skills via android debugger and network tools like charlesltligtltligtquick adaptability to new android versionsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtminimum qualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtbachelor of science and years experience in software engineering or master of science years experience in software engineeringltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtpreferred qualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtmasters degree in computer science or related field and years experience in software engineering or related fieldltbrgtltbrgttechnology powering the next retail disruptionltbrgtltbrgtimagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face thats what we do at walmart global tech were a team of software engineers data scientists and service professionals within walmart the worlds largest retailer delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our million associatesltbrgtltbrgtto others innovation looks like an app service or some code but walmart has always been about people people are why we innovate and people power our innovations ltemgtbeing human led is our true disruptionltbrgtltbrgtltemgtecomretailltbrgtltbrgtwalmart is the worlds largest retailer and fortune company in fact theres a store within miles of most americans each week walmart is counted on by million customers weekly to provide groceries and essentials while introducing them to new products services and brands to help them save money and live betterltbrgtltbrgtsustainable growthltbrgtltbrgtomnichannel merchants take a degree view on what is needed to drive sustainable growth both online and in stores it comes down to creating a seamless experience for our customers whether they are shopping online or in storesltbrgtltbrgtdynamic centerltbrgtltbrgtwalmarts assortment covers home goods grocery apparel beauty electronics and so much more our merchandising associates driven by passion use market data and analytics risk taking efficiency and innovation to form the dynamic center from which it all beginsltbrgtltbrgtdiversity and inclusionltbrgtltbrgtthe global office of culture diversity equity ampamp inclusions cdei mission is to create a culture where all associates feel included and are engaged to deliver on our purpose of saving people money so they can live better hear more about this focus from ben hasan senior vice president and global chief culture diversity equity ampamp inclusion officer and view the full culture diversity equity ampamp inclusion report hereltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtminimum
